thread.title: Sony pays price for hack attack - WMDT
thread.title_full: Sony pays price for hack attack - WMDT - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WMDT
title: Sony pays price for hack attack - WMDT
text:
Eleven months after falling victim to a catastrophic hacking attack, Sony Pictures has settled a class action lawsuit filed by employees who feared identity theft. The movie studio will pay almost $8 million, much of it to lawyers, but also to current and former employees who suffer damages or need fraud protection services.
 WMDT.
